H0.text: What colour is the bottom stripe on the U.S. flag. Blue

H1.text: What colour is the bottom stripe on the U.S. flag. Green

H2.text: What colour is the bottom stripe on the U.S. flag. Yellow

H3.text: What colour is the bottom stripe on the U.S. flag. Red

A4.text: The flag consists of thirteen horizontal stripes, alternating red and white.
